description:
Faithful Home Services provides emergency home repairs which include plumbing, electrical, window and exterior door, roof repairs, upgrades for physically disabled persons and mitigation inspections. This program is specifically meant to address issues of the health, safety and well-being of the home occupants.

***Note: Currently closed due to a lack of funding; will reopen at a later date. DO NOT refer.***
name: FAITHFUL HOME SERVICES, INC.
